trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 2 other sightings in Phoenix on or around January 9th 2011
divs: sighting detailscoming north on i-17 from peoria to anthem, i saw a very bright light north of me. i continued to see it......it appeared not to be moving. as i exited the freeway, the ufo came closer and went in the same direction i was going. it got a bit ahead of me, but i could see it was going to fly over my house. i got to the driveway, jumped out of the car and ran to my back yard. the ufo was still close enough to see it's underside. it was square, with a single white light at each corner. it looked a little like a lego brick. the light that was coming from the top of it was so bright i couldn't see any shape. the ufo made no noise. i estimate it was at an altitude that a commercial jet would be on approach for a landing. i watched it go south and then lost it. this morning mon.\10\2011) i woke up at 6:00am as i usually do, looked at the clock and went back to sleep. i had a dream. i was with a group of people and we were all looking at something in the sky. it looked like a huge kite. it was whispy, with streamers coming off it. we were seeing it from the side. the color was a deep pink\dusty rose. then it turned and came towards us. it was now facing us. it looked like it had 2 paralle cylinder type sides. it was rectangle shaped and very lace-like and whispy in the center. while we were looking at it. i heard a tune and words. the words were, "happy christian(s) coming, jesus christ is coming." i felt no emotion during the dream. when i woke up, i didn't feel any emotions different from usual. the tune and the words have been with me all day. i have never had anything close to this experience before. i have recently had sitings, but this felt different.
